name: Enter The Moshpit
description:
Lay back, relax, and be an original Punk from Livorno, Italy trying to sneak in the moshpit of the most hardcore brutal trash gutter punk band in the heart of Tuscany. Drink some beer, give a joint to the cops, and talk endlessly to your teddy bear in this short, unique adventure game that will make you face your gods and demons.
Based on a true story.
